research... including 110 of 111 national football league players. researchers with boston university's c-t-e center examined brain tissue donated by 202 deceased former football players.they found the condition in 87-percent of men who played for an average of 15 years ... including high- school college semi- professional and professional play.86-percent of professional players diagnosed with
